income.title: Income Report
income.subtitle: View and export your income by calendar year
income.noEarnings: No earnings registered in this period
income.noteText: Values in Brazilian Real (BRL) are approximate, based on the exchange rates from the last day of the calendar year.
income.legalNote: This document serves only as an income report and does not replace the official tax return.
